verbose_text: Western blot indicated JEV NS5 protein suppressing phosphorylated levels of ERK1/2, not p38 MAPK, in response to IFNbeta (Supporting Information Fig. XREF_FIG); JEV NS5 protein affects transcriptional activation of calreticulin promoter by reducing ERK1/2 phosphorylation.
evidence: phosphorylated levels of ERK1/2, not p38 MAPK, in response to IFNbeta
